title: Lesson Learned
description: Blush sensuality This is a sensual romance (may have explicit love scenes, but not erotic in frequency or type).Tired of having been constantly on the move, Drew is determined to make Cardiff his home. When he starts his new job as a teacher, he strikes up an immediate friendship with Nathan Morgan, a young history teacher.Nathan is instantly attracted to Drew but doesn’t want to risk their fledgling friendship by declaring the extent of his desire. Completely oblivious to Nathan’s quandary, Drew doesn’t realize the true nature of his own feelings for Nathan until accusations from a student force both men’s hands.Drew has spent his life running away. Running away from his mistakes, his desires and a secret-filled past. This time, he’s forced to choose between running once more and a possible future with Nathan.
author: Lillian Francis
